Create Table dbo.Tb_$TableName$(
	$ColumnName$Id Int Identity(1,1) NOT NULL,
	$ColumnName$Code nvarchar(50) NOT NULL,
	$ColumnName$Name nvarchar(100) NULL,
	AddDate DateTime Not Null Constraint DF_Tb_Rn_System_CoreObjects_AddDate Default(GETDATE()),
	AddUser Int Not Null,
	UpdateDate DateTime Null,
	UpdateUser Int  Null,
	Notes NVarchar(250),
	IsActive bit Constraint DF_Tb_Rn_System_CoreObjects_IsActive Default 1
	--, IsActive Bit Default 1 Not Null 	--Tanım tablosu ise eklenecek
	--, ByPassTrig Bit Default 0 			--Update trig olacaksa eklenecek
	--, CONSTRAINT FK_$TableName$_$TableName2$_$ColumnName$Id
    --    FOREIGN KEY ($ColumnName$Id) REFERENCES $TableName2$($ColumnName$Id),
	Constraint Pk_$TableName$              -- Custom name for the primary key constraint
        Primary Key Clustered ($ColumnName$Id)
) On [PRIMARY];

Create Unique Index Uix_$TableName$ On Tb_$TableName$ ($ColumnName$Code);
Go

--ekranlar için
Create View Sv_$TableName$
--WITH ENCRYPTION, SCHEMABINDING, VIEW_METADATA
AS
    Select * From dbo.Tb_$TableName$
-- WITH CHECK OPTION
GO


Create View Pv_$TableName$
--WITH ENCRYPTION, SCHEMABINDING, VIEW_METADATA
AS
    Select * From dbo.Tb_$TableName$
    --joinli hali
-- WITH CHECK OPTION
GO
